content.detailedDescription:
First event, was one, apricot in color, moving north slow, 30 mph,  like a flame, 15 minutes latter philippine fighter jets going same direction.  3 months latter again over manila, 
  next event;
  week latter the 3 vee shapped ones flew over  slow, we were on the roof of a 10 story condo. only visable because of the city lights reflection.  
  thats more than i have seen in my entire life. 
  my friend is a pilot from alaska, all his adult life, and he never seen one till now. 
 nothing chassed the vee ones.
  thx for all you have done. been listening since art started 20 yeas now. 
  [name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: 3 vee shaped, about 400 feet, no lights, 200 mph. going north

content.detailedDescription: I was trying to get internet connection on my girlfriends cellphone when i noticed it was very difficult to get any connection so i stepped outside to get better signal i moved the cellphone around to see if i could get better connection when i noticed an object in the sky first in the north moving in almost a straight south path above my house below the clouds it didn't have any recognizable airplane lights or noise it moved as if it was gliding forward without any loss of altitude the color of the object was grayish to white with what looked like a dim white led light on the bottom, its diameter was round with a flat bottom i immediately called my girlfriend to witness the object along with my neighbor whom i called out of his house. we watched the object move steadily n to s when my girlfriend noticed a few more dim orange yellow lights above the clouds following it a row moving at the same speed,direction and path until it was over my house about 600 ft behind my house then the object stopped in the sky and went up into the clouds and disappeared. during the event i felt chills and goosebumps  because i was thinking to my self their back again also felling a little scared and anxious. this is not first time there has been an object float across the sky in front of my house. i have seen them move over my house moving in the same direction about two years ago that event was with a red pulsating sphere. also seeing them off the waters edge of navy pier numerous yellow orange dots falling left to right only after to look up and notice all the stars shift in the sky then back again in place like a big object was moving above us
content.summary: I noticed a almost dim white object in the sky above my house moving n to s at low altitude below the clouds

content.detailedDescription: My mother and i were heading west down us 180 about 3 miles east of the small unincorporated community of funston, tx, in jones county around 10:15pm on the evening of june 6, 2011.  while looking at the road, i noticed a low flying object, that i thought to be a plane.  as it crossed over the road in front of us, we joked around about the possibility of it being a "ufo."  finally, the object stopped; and seemed to hover in midair.  as we got closer, we could see the object had white/green led like lights on the bottom, and there was also a flashing red light in the center.  the lights were arranged in a triangular formation.  as we got closer, we believed the object to be a radio tower.  but as we pulled up to the point where we were about even with the object, we could tell it had more "depth," than just a radio tower.  this thing was big.  the object was still hovering over what i believe is a field (probably hovering around 70-100').  i stopped the vehicle on the shoulder of the highway and my mother rolled the window down.  instantly the object began to move slowly in an east-northeast direction.  the object had absolutely no sound whatsoever as it began to move; it began to move faster and faster.  i immediately turned the car around and headed east down us 180 as i tried to see where the object went.  the lights got smaller and smaller and finally appeared as only one light that flashed.  the object kept getting smaller and smaller and i decided to turn around.  i felt very confused, yet excited about what i had just seen.  later that night, the excitement turned to a slight amount of fear.  i didn't know if this was some kind of plane, jet, helicopter, or et life...It was certainly a highlight of the night.  we both discussed what we had just seen, and both questioned how it could be a plane/jet since there was no sound.  whatever it was, it did not like it when we stopped the vehicle.  it took off immediately.  never was there a sound.  it was an extremely weird night....
content.summary: Silent/hovering triangular-formation of lights suddenly took off

content.detailedDescription: I was out in the front of my house looking up at the sky and saw what looked to be a bright star that seemed to be gliding upwards and further away and then all of a sudden it disappeared. i know it was not an airplane because i saw a few of those in the sky too at the time and could tell they were airplanes by the way they were moving and how their lights were blinking. what i saw was a lot higher than the altitude that airplanes can get to but it was either big enough or close enough for me to have seen it. i first thought i was maybe seeing a "shooting star", but i have seen those in the past and what i saw did not have a "tail" and it was gliding.
content.summary: Bright star-like figure

content.detailedDescription: This is not the first time i have seen these here.  like usual, i was outside, taking the trash out and smoking a cigarette.  i looked up and noticed a star that appeared to be moving.  i got my friend's attention and he saw it too, then i went inside and got my cousin and she saw it as well.  it looked just like any regular star in the sky, but it would go from so dim that it disappeared to super bright.  it would do this off and on and never stayed bright or dim, always changing.  it would stop at some points and then start to move again, but always moved slow...Sometimes it would be stopped and then all of a sudden move real quick in a jerky motion, then stop again or continue to move but super slow.  it would go up, then at times it would zig zag real quick..Like for only a second...Other times it would move to the right real quick, jerky like then continue up...And then at times it would go left and then up, one time it went up..Then right...Then up..Then left..Then stopped..Then disappeared for a few minutes, then reappeared super bright...Then move slowly and get dimmer.  about 15 minutes after we started watching it, some what appeared to be some type of military jets or something...Usually always see them after i notice one of these things.  first we noticed something (jets) moving super fast going straight up and to the left of the object we were watching, then we saw another jet or jets coming from the right and going left below the object we were watching.  the object continued to appear and disappear, get dimmer and brighter, move in all directions, then about another 10 minutes later, more jets came in from the left and were going right.  at this point we noticed that there was more than one object in the sky moving like the first one...But they did not get as bright and were not quite as noticable as the first object.  my neck started hurting from looking up and watching all of this go on in the sky so i came inside.  i am about to go back out right now and see if it or they are still up there.  this whole time it stayed in the same general area, did not go across the sky like any plane,jet, shooting star, satelite, or anything of the sort does.  i tried to get it on video but i do not have a good video camera and it just appeared all black on the screen.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looked like a star,got dimmer & brighter,moved in all directions

content.detailedDescription: I was riding around with a friend one evening out in the country near our hometown on the ohio-indiana border. it was dark. on one stretch of road we came around a turn with trees on the left side and a field on the right. the road stretched out for maybe 400 feet in front of us. to our left i saw something bright through the trees moving towards the road in front of us maybe 200 feet down the road. it was low, no more than 50 feet above the trees. as it broke into the open i was shocked to see it was a flying saucer. it looked like two saucers put together like this <=>. it was brightly lit like it was glowing from within. it was red on the bottom and green on top. maybe it was the other way around, it's been a long time. there were no lights or other cars around. as it flew over the road i leaned forward and put my hand on the dash. when it was just past the road it sped up until it was moving so fast it became a streak of light. it just zipped away. nothing can move that fast. i stared after it for a second then looked over at my friend who was driving. it was then i noticed he had stopped and was staring after it as i had been. he looked at me and said "let's get the hell out of here!" it really scared us and shook us up. we drove quickly back to town.
content.summary: Saw a flying saucer fly over the road and zip away

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my patio with my husband and happen to be looking to the northwest around 10pm and a star suddenly appeared in the sky, which surprised me. it was twinkling  and emitting a red and white color. by judging, it was as far off as a airline jet would be in the sky. i thought it was a airplane, but then it didn't move. from where i was sitting, i could look up and see 4 electrical wires on poles and the object was above the wires, not moving. i went in the house for about 2 minutes, came out and sat down in the same chair and the object had moved below the first wire! this caught my attention, so i watched it more closely. i had my husband look it it also. slowly it descended below the second wire, then slowly went back up, all along using the eletrical wires to judge where it was at. this all occured in a matter of minutes. then it descended back down then moved northwest moving quite a distant. i suddenly saw a plane fly across the path it had been in...And i knew this was a plane. all a sudden i saw another very faint orb-like object appear to the southwest of the plane and the first star like object. now i was watching the electric pole to judge the first object and it was just pass it. the second faint orb did nothing for several moments, then suddenly glowed for half a second i would guess. then the first orb started to slowly move more northwest...And the second orb followed, emitting a glow every few minutes. i began to judge the second orb movements by the electrical wires...And it appeared to be following the first orb, although the kept the same distance from each other. i observed two more airplanes fly between the two orbs during this time. finally i went in the house, but i could still see both orbs in the distant sky. i really have no idea what they were...But i do know they weren't planes. 

i did get my camcorder out to try and video tape them, but it was too dark.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A star=like figure suddenly appeared in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from working out on the same route i've taken many, many times before. there is an small airport right near the area i was in when i saw the object however this object appeared to be far off in the distance to the west. i do not live in the area i saw the object either, but, i moved from there to a place about 20 minutes west just about 2 months (this specific area i lived in for about 4 years and it is in my hometown of 31 years so i feel fairly confident about saying this was not a normal occurrence for the area. i was heading west at about 10:30 at night and i happened to be looking up at the moon when i saw it. the object was a circular shape and, from my vantage point, appeared flat. it was very brief, maybe 3 seconds, but in that time it flashed from a bright and pale blue to totally invisible to me two times before totally leaving my field of view. it may have been nothing but i know that no meteor i've ever seen flashes and the distance this thing seemed to travel, from my perspective, was very large. also, i think i made out a darker circle within the larger, main one but it was such a short view and moved so quickly i can not be 100% certain about this fact. i'd love to know if anyone else happened to see this but i know the likelihood of that is very small. i was contacted by a mufon investigator on another sighting i posted here in the past and would welcome talking with him, or another investigator, about this sighting as well.
content.summary: Appeared as an extremely fast moving, bright pale blue, circle possibly with a trail.

content.detailedDescription:
Second hand report.

i heard the eye witness on the local radio station today. three lights in a triangle shape were seen over spruce grove, alberta. it is reported to have left the area faster than any known aircraft can move.
content.summary: Triangle seen

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my deck facing south in walkersville md.  my house is about 1/2 mile from route 15 north of frederick md.  i noticed a bright light on the horizon.  the object moved above the tree line, then went back down again, to the left, slowly, until i couldn't see it anymore.  a friend of mine in thurmont md (north of here, not far from camp david), could see it as well.  i snapped a picture of it with my iphone camera, then ran to get my digital camera, switched it to the video setting, and filmed about 41 seconds of it.  it appeared a few more times, then didn't come back anymore.  i honestly thought it was a state police helicopter at first, but after awhile, it was apparent this was not a helicopter.  no noise at all.

here is a link to the video i posted of the event on facebook...

[link moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Bright, saucer shaped, oblong, slow moving.

content.detailedDescription: While standing in our front yard, i saw an orange, glowing ball, several times larger-looking than a star, moving across the sky over towson, md (about a mile north of baltimore).  i immediately shouted for my wife and son to come outside to see it. they instantly saw the object as it was very  orange and bright. it moved south to north, silently, somewhat slower than a typical plane.  the shape flowed from round to squarish to round again.  initially the object was larger and brighter, and became deeper in color and smaller.  it began ascending, flickered once, then vanished in plain view.  we did not lose sight of the object-- it vanished before our eyes.
content.summary: Orange glowing ball silently moving across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
On may 28, 2011, at 9:30 p.M. i went outside to turn off the water hose that i had soaking my magnolia tree.  i notice 5 very bright yellow circles with a smaller red circle of lights on the outside floating over my head.  they were traveling south to north very slow and there was no sound.  soon 3 or 4 more circles came over, then several more, etc.  i watched for 20 mins. and counted 15 total.  
they were not in a formation and were not bouncing all over the sky.  they seem to stay on the south to north path.
i called the lone star airport around 10 p.M. to report what i had seen and asked if they had seen anything in the sky, but no one there had seen anything.  since then i've learned that a neighbor had seen the same thing around the same time but had counted more circles.  they must have started watching before i came outside.
content.summary: For 20 minutes i watched 15 yellow circles  fly over my house

content.detailedDescription: As i walked out the front door of a friend i normally visit two or three times a week, it would most customary for me to look up at the sky to find the moon or just to check the weather as it can change in no time at all in the chicagoland area. this particular eve may 21 2011 at 10:30 pm was exceedingly clear,as i was going to my vehicle again basically looking up to the northern sky i immediatly viewed a huge triangle shaped object heading in my direction coming out of the north heading south 3 very bright orbs and the color of which i still cant identify as anything i've seen before my best guess is a rose-orange. no sound whatsoever i was stunned as ive never seen anything like this other than on tv.I viewed it maybe 10 seconds and then re entered the friends home to have her witness the event it was still heading south or in our direction she couldnt believe it either. as we watched together we were yelling what is it is this real we were quite axcited to say the least. then within maybe 10 seconds out of the east sky tracking southeast another single orb same color and intensity came shooting towards the triangle and another 5 or 6 followed in suit. now sky is lit with these things we ran into the street to get a better angle as ther are a few tall trees. as a pick up truck approached i flagged him him down am not sure why out of excitment i guess of course he had to wonder what does this guy want i was yelling to look up in sky are seeing this he seemed dumbfounded but was cooperatve and asked if we had a camera, well not with unfortunately he didnt know to make of it and watched untill they left. then as the single orbs started catching up to the triangle the triangular object then started to turn in a rather quick arch heading northwest as did the all the other objects. i speculate this occurence lasted from 75 to 90 seconds really plenty of time for an excellent view. being dark it was hard to tell how really close they were to us maybe  a quarter mile. they moved effortlessly quickly silently. at about 10:35 i called the vernon hills police dept. to report this leave it on record as i thought maybe someone else may have witnessed this sighting hopefully.
content.summary: One  huge triangular shaped object defined by 3 very bright orbs then followed by 6 or 7 singuar orbs l

content.detailedDescription: First i thought it was my friend on adjacent rooftop lighting napkins until it started doing figure 8 movements then another came as if to make communication with the first then they stood still and shot back  up in to the sky with what was what appeared to be be what a shooting star leaves behind in its trail... little sparkles behind it they were... glowing orange..I know what i saw .
content.summary: Sighting

content.detailedDescription: I went out side in my back yard to smoke and was looking up at the stars when i seen this bright red and orange light moving fairly fast from east to west. at first i thought it was a satielite but then once i figured out the direction it was moving i realized i never seen one move from east to west, there was also upper level clouds out that night and the light was below the cloud level. i would guess speed around 500 to 600 mph. there was no sound coming from the light at all. the last i seen the object was still traveing west before i lost sight over it over my house.
content.summary: Orange to red ball of light moving above north east lincoln ne

content.detailedDescription:
I took this photo at the corner of riverside dr. and eastland ave. in nashville, tn at 2144 cst on 5 june 2011 with my htc thunderbolt phone camera. there was a large triangular form with lights at each point. it appeared to be massive, over a football field in size. it also appeared to be over the river or close to it. it gained altitude while rotating clockwise and the "faded out" while heading nw. the rear lights faded before the front one. 

my wife and i were driving home from visiting my parents who are flying to ca in the morning. on our return home we were heading west on eastland ave., up a slight hill. my wife points to the left over some trees and i can see something, it turned out to be these three lights. we stopped at the stop sign at the top of the hill and i got out my phone. i notice a car coming behind me, so i turned right and pulled immediately to the shoulder of the road. i got out and noticed that the car behind me stopped and got out too. as i took the photo i realized that at least 7 cars had stopped and were watching. it lasted about 3 minutes from when we first spotted it. i took a quick video as well. after it faded everyone was just in shock and got it their cars and left. we talked to the guys who pulled up behind us, and i showed him the photo i took. we high-fived and left. it was certainly disturbing and everyone was in disbelief.

[links moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]
content.summary: 3 bring lights in triangular form hovering and disappearing

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving south down interstate 380 from cedar rapids towards exit 10 (swisher/shueyville exit).  as i approached the rest stop from the north i noticed a iowa state trooper pulled over on the side of the road with his cherries on.  as i drove past him, i looked in my rearview mirror and noted only his rear cherries were on as from the front, he only had parking lights on and not even headlights turned on.  i just thought that was odd, it was as if he were watching something.  so i instinctively scanned the skys and to my southeast, i saw several orange lights in the sky approximately over shueyville.  

for a second i thought they must be on a cell tower or building but then i knew there were no towers or tall buildings in that area so i kept looking and that's when i noticed the lights were slowly changing position in relationship to each other.  i also for a second thought maybe they were fireworks but as i kept driving south, the lights did not change intensity and did not fall to the ground.  they did not blink and were just a light orange color.

by this time i was nearing my exit so i started up the exit ramp and pulled over on the side of the road.  i tried to take a picture with my blackberry but the picture just turned out black - the camera was just not sensitive enough to pick out the orange lights.  they had no shape as they were too far away but they did not appear to be at a very high altitude - maybe like the altitude of an airplane on appoach to an airport.  i could not hear anything other than the sounds of i-380.  there were at least 3 lights and they very slowly changing position in relationship with each other but other than that, did not appear to move in any specific direction relative to where i was parked.  after about 2 more minutes of watching them, they just started faded, one at a time, until there was nothing left.  

i have lived in this area all of my life and have never seen flares dropped and there are no military bases nearby.  that said, these may have been flares but i don't know why or who would drop flares around here and having never personally seen flares dropped, i have nothing to compare them to.

if anyone else saw these or knows what they were, please let me know.  very curious.
content.summary: 3 orange lights hovering over shueyville, iowa

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my room watching tv and my dad ran inside, telling me to,"come look at this light!" when he went out on the back porch to smoke a cigarette he noticed a light flying across the sky from the south.I ran outside and saw a fiery ball of light flying across the sky. it was incredibly close and completely silent. it was incredible to witness and made me feel rather melancholy. my view from the back porch became obscured as it flew beyond the surrounding trees, so i ran around to the front of my house and watched it from the street. i flew to the north, grew steadily smaller and eventually disappeared into the night sky.
content.summary: Fiery light flew across the sky - south to north east

content.detailedDescription:
The night began watching tv i live on the third floor of an apartment building. i went out my deck to smoke a cigarette, i took notice to something i thoguht was unusual. i happen to look up in the sky and every 5 seconds i would see a light moving across the sky silently from the same exact spot every time.
at firtst i thought there was something going on with the military because it seemed like there was too many "planes" in the sky, but it was just silent; so it couldn't have been.
i called and reported apprehensivley and asked if they were aware of any military planes in the area. i had to hang up because she made me feel crazy.  i then went back outside and now had a witness to confirm that was seeing it correctly.
after this was confirmed, the lights seemed to scatter everywhere, around and in the distance of my building.  then for some reason i looked over my shoulder and up and saw two lights shining directly down. the object was about 50 feet above our heads and in a matter of seconds the lights turned upright and this is when i saw the shape of a capsule.  almost acorn like or the space shuttle capsule. there was no noise at all.  my hair stood up and time seemed to stand still and slow down and my heart started to pound in disbelief.  i watched this turn upright, and silently at a speed i cant fathom and watched as it went off into eternity. it was so fast that it felt surreal and i couldn't beleive it. i never believed  but this has changed me and the person i was with.  
 i took me a long time to come to terms with what i saw.    
if possible please do not make public my email address, if mufon wants to ask me a question then thats no problem.
i feel crazy even sending this.
content.summary: Began with silent lights appearing every 5 seconds from the same exact spot.

content.detailedDescription: Went outside after the storm on may-24-2011 took several pictures not with a camera but with my cellphone did not see anything strange other than the cloud formation that is my biggest thing two days later i was going over my photos and i saw this spot on the phone and thats when i noticed this object i would hope someone would come and investigate and tell what they think
content.summary: Did not notce until two days later so i would not know what to say it is of a round shape thats all i know

content.detailedDescription:
back in april i noticed a orange, red, green, white and yellow object from my bathroom window.  i saw it with my binoculars.  then i started to notice more strange things and became very aware of my surroundings.  since that first light i now know that there are things with almost a 
predator like look about them.  i actually saw when the wind blew a lime green snake like object with big green eyes with a vertical black line in the middle looking around and several feet away a brown and white owl like object under my tree with tiny moveable lights.  i took my video camera and caught it on hd.  i have since discovered there is actually something in tree's.  i have many videos of lights in the tree's, during day and night.  i see after all my current awareness that there is something illuminating the tree's.  i feel like there always watching.  because you usually see two lit dots close together then one or all will dim out.  it seems to manipulate the foliage and has some intellictual intent to hide.  but i see it!!!!  i am an rn, not registered nut! i have proof that will back up my statements.  the wind really seems to excacerbate these things.  the setting and rising sun lights really glitters brillantly off these things in the trees.  at night i get a little scared because i saw a projection like large snake like face in my binoculars looking at me.  at work, i caught this deformed snake like object(s), in a tree at night all green, moving and lighting up when i took my cell phone and video camera to it.  i have an employee witness this with me and alone.  please help.  i need to know what a professional thinks of my footage.  i want you to come and see for yourself.  i know this can't be explained.  but i know this is real!  
   this all started in april, 2011.  i also have seen a silver blinking dancing light in the sky at times.  and there is a red, green, yellow reflection on my neighbors garage door. also, i have seen it above the tree line and i think in the sky.  
   one night at sunset i saw red lights twirling around in two occassions in the woods. scary.  and when i was at work i saw a christmas light like bubble blob over a tree then followed by two red twinkling round ones in succession.  my witness saw one of them two.  this is when he started to think i was crazy until i showed him that weired lighted green thing in the tree.  i have it on my camera's.  call me, cell is [phone number removed/cms/tg]].  i have seen you guys before, wait til you see my stuff!!!!  i hope you contact me soon.  this is such a stressor for me to know of it basically alone.
   thanks for your attention.
                                                 [name removed/cms/tg], rn 6-11
content.summary: Lights in trees primarily, caught on video and eyewitnessed.,etc... shiny moving object in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside at 10:15 looking up in the sky with a geniii night vision scope. i saw at least 6 different craft at very high altitude. the craft were mostly traveling from the south to the north.  one craft was traveling east to west in a slightly erratic flight path.  i was able to film this craft via night vision and iphone.  the video is very good and clearly shows the craft stoping mid flight the dissapearing from site.  

the last craft was a glowing orange sphere at a low altitude and could be seen with a naked eye.  this craft was moving from the north to the south. i was able to video this craft and it clearly appears as a very slow moving very very bright glowing object.  there are no strobe or flashing lights similiar to typical aircraft.  the video is also very good quality.  i will try to post the when i am on a desk top or lap top computer.  

in addition i viewed many aircraft this night and contrails could be clearly seen through night vision.   all the craft described above left no trails.  it was amazing seeing so many in such a short time.  clearly the skies are getting busier. just get outside and look up
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Numerous high and low altitude spheres

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i were having a very late christmas celebration at my apt in fort collins. we went outside to take some photos of the kids by a snowfort, someone had built. 
my sister in law and my brother made a comment about something in the sky. they thought it might be a hang glider or one of those motorized kites that people can fly around in. i saw it in the distance. which was west of where we were. i took a few close up photos of it. i do recall that it seemed to be flashing from underneath but i didn't photograph any light coming from it. it actually seemed to be rotating. my brother and i used my binoculars to look at it. the out side seemed to have a covering of octagonal bumps. like you find of the shell of a sand turtle. i have attached some of the photos i took which also show it enlarged. there was no noise associated with it and it seemed to be a great distance away. i could not estimate the size of this.
i do recall thinking it is going to go away now and it most certainly did by drifting north towards wyo. i have never heard of anyone here seeing this.
at one time i attempted to bring this to the mufon conference in denver. i was asked then to make this report. i would be willing to talk about it with a researcher.

in the last photo you can enlarge it and see the stripe at a horizontal angle. i didn't know this until i uploaded the photo to my new computer.
i have a total of 5 photos and one was taken with my iphone for gps tagging of my location.
content.summary: Tetrahedron

content.detailedDescription:
As i stated in my previous message i never made it to my duty station in piegan, montana. i was going to work for us customs in piegan, montana. my past id is 194485 class 626a sept. 2006.

i was attacked on bridge in charleston, west virginia and somehow taken to another bridge about 1 or 2 miles from where i was at. my mind is blank..I do not know what or how i was taken.

physical problems since the attack-these beings put something in my right ear and i came back to nc with telepathic abilities. 

telepathic ability- i will attempt to explain this- it is like being able to hear other humans in my head without the use of my ears. it is like listening to a radio and not being able to turn this off. the others that i am able to hear talking in my head have used me like their own et doll. i mean they have attempted to program me like a computer. they have used the book of war on me. they have attempted to make me go without sleep for days-usually 3 at a time until i go nuts. i finally just got to the point i would take a sleep aid to knock me out. as long as i get sleep i am ok and can function. some of the speech patterns are familar to me of humans that i know. i have even tested these other humans and gave them my cell phone number and address attempting to get them to make actual contact. these other humans or whatever they are will not do this. so basically i hear them talking about me 24 hours a day other than when i am asleep. sleep is the only break i get! these others that i can hear have developed some kind of code or use certain words that sort-of clue me in on who they are. these telepathic thing is totally seperate from when i am attacked by the alien beings. when i am attacked by the alien beings i am physically being attacked. others may not be able to see the beings but they can touch me. they mess around with my physical body. they have not bothered me since may. these being come and go..They will appear to be lights or shadows-orbs or gray like beings.


problems i have gone through since my return to nc- when i first got back i was in shock..Instead of someone taking me to my regular doctor and getting me checked out physically my mother had me thrown into a mental hospital. i was tortured by foreign doctors. it took me 1 month to get released. my career in law-enforcement was destroyed by this action being taken. i am not crazy! i have been attacked by these beings and no-one would believe me. i am banned at home from saying the word alien, customs, or montana. i am not allowed to talk about what has happened to me. basically i am told to just get on with my life and forget.

i have been beat up by the cops here in nc-cherryville city and cleveland county sheriff department and rutherford county sheriff department. basically someone in my family will go and take out involuntary committment papers on me and then the cops chase me down and send me off to a mental hospital where they attempt to kill me by over dosing me on meds. the last attempt to kill me in a hospital was at gaston memorial where they forced meds on me that dropped my bp down to 77/44. if i am sent off to a local hospital it will take up to 2 weeks to get out. if i am sent off to a state hospital it will take 1 month. 

i work full-time as a cna at cleveland pines in shelby, nc and i will be going to college this fall at cleveland community college in shelby, nc. i am going back to school this fall for nursing-rn degree.

what i need from you guys is protection-from the police and from being thrown into mental hospitals when there is nothing wrong with me. 

i need for you guys to move in people around me in this area-gaston county-cleveland county-rutherford county-see if you guys start picking up this telepathic thing going on down here.

every time i get thrown into a mental hospital the first people i call are the church of scientology in charlotte, nc and then they make contact with ca or ny. ny has saved my life before from kings mountain hospital where they were attempting to kill me with meds. 

you may contact me through me e-mail [email removed/cms/tg] i do not have my own computer but i am saving to buy one. i do not have a phone right now because someone broke into my jeep and stole the only 2 phones that i had. 

ps- my youngest child was taken from me because i was talking about being attacked by aliens. gaston county dss did this to me feb-15-2010. i have been fighting to get him back and i will be in court in gaston county tues-at 9:30am. i am doing all that i can to get my child back and if there is anything that you guys can do to help me i would be very thankful. my youngest son is 16 years old and i have a job and a home for us to live in and there is no reason that i cannot get him back.

sincerely, amy in nc
content.summary: 2nd msg to mufon

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 23:10 saturday 6-4-2011 when my wife took the dog out back. i was on the couch where i had been all day with a touch of a stomach flu. within about a minute of her going outside she came back in demanding me to get up and come outside to see "something is wrong with the sky". i begrudgingly got up to go out back and investigate. when i came out she was at the end of the pool deck facing the eastern horizon and pointing in that direction demanding to look. as i came out of the door, past the stoop and at the end of the deck i noticed numerous large red elliptical shaped objects in the eastern sky. these objects were moving from a south to north direction at about the speed of a slow moving prop plane or helicopter, maybe a bit slower actually. these objects were red in color, with no pulsating lights, no strobe, no change in color, no flickering etc. they were just a constant red glow. the objects all moved at the same rate of speed, same direction and at the same altitude. they never drifted apart from one another always maintaing the same distance from one another. they were very large and you could not have missed them much, much larger than landing lights or marker lights of planes etc. when these objects came to a certain point in the sky, roughly above my neighbors house, the lights would turn off. no fading or flickering, again, just like a light switch and they were out. i followed one to that point and when the light went out i could make out an outline of a rectangular like shape briefly before it was obscured by trees.
if i had to judge i would say the altitude was between 1,000 and 5,000 feet. speed would be less than 100 knots and approximate location (direction or landmark it was following) would have been centered over memorial drive, give or take. 
i know memorial drive is a common approach land mark for planes flying into tia however, these were not planes. there was absolutely no noise coming from them and the amount that were there would have made a racket. in fact, it was oddly quiet for the city on a saturday night further adding to the no noise. 
all in all i would say that there was approximately 25 or so of the lights. they seemed organized yet random, if you catch my drift? one grouping had a formation, 5 objects, like geese but without the lead bird. 
this was my first ever experience of anything that i couldn't put a rational explanation to. it left my wife and i a bit excited, to say the least. my wife took several pictures on her phone but only one came out. i think she was shaking so the objects appear smeared. if you notice in the upper part of the picture you see many more smaller red "orbs" i had not noticed these until today.
content.summary: Large red elliptical shapes in eastern sky

content.detailedDescription:
Same beings since sept-2006 usual attack usually once or twice a year. my first attack was sept-2006. i was on amtrak enroute to go and work for homeland security. i was going to work for us customs and border patrol-duty station-piegan, montana. past us customs id 194485 class 626a sept-2006.

my life was threatened on amtrak train in charlottesville, virginia. a black female on the train told me that i was going to die. i did not know the female. i moved to another area of the train and called 911. i was told by the dispatcher to get off the train at the next stop. i got off the train in charleston, west virginia. i was afraid to take a taxi from the station so i attempted to walk to a hotel within site of the amtrak station. i went out of the back of the station and walked across railroad tracks. i dropped my pillow and blanket on the tracks and began to run. i ran to the left and attempted to make it to a bridge. i made it to the bridge area and then my mind goes blank. i wake up at another bridge about 1 or 2 miles from where i was at. i do not know how i got to the other bridge. my clothes were still on and i still had cash in my pants pocket. i still had my black bag with all my personal items in it. i was like in shock. i began walking down the road and some police guy picked me up and all i said to him was to please drive me to a hotel. i got to a small hotel across from the hospital there in charleston, west virginia. i was in shock and i sort-of felt like i had been drugged. i felt like i was being hunted by something. all of my survival instincts turned on. i did not feel safe in the hotel that i was at. i began calling family members to come and get me. they could not come until 2 days later. i was stuck in charleston, west virginia for two nights. i was afraid of something that i cannot even explain and i was cautious of other humans. i feel like i was being hunted and tracked. i made a report with barbara inselman at fort snelling, mn-human resources with homeland security. i called us customs in dc and begged them to come and get me! i called my duty station in piegan, montana-don terry whom is now working and canada and begged for someone to come and help me. 

fact-something took me from one bridge in charleston, west virginia and took me to another bridge about 1 or 2 miles away. my mind is blank-the only physical affect that i have suffered is coming back to nc with telepathic abilities. 

getting back to my attempt to get to my duty station. i made it back to nc from west virginia. i re-scheduled and tried again. i had no problems until amtrak train 29 dc to chicago. i could not afford to fly so i was stuck back on amtrak attempting to make it to montana. 

on train 29 dc to chicago i felt like i had been drugged. my heart was skipping beats, my mouth dry and numbness in my head and arms and confusion and slurred speech. i called 911 from the train and was taken to a hospital in chicago. i told the doctor that i felt like i had been drugged on the train and i was en-route to work for us customs in montana. the doctor was a white male in his 40's tall brown hair maybe 6'2 190lbs. i overheard the doctor tell someone in the hallway that he did not want homeland security in there investigating! when i over heard this i knew i was not going to get the care and test that i needed. i signed myself out of the hospital and put my customs id on the paperwork-194485 class 626a sept-2006. i stayed at a hotel withing walking distance from the hospital for one night and attempted to treat myself. 

i made it as far as rugby, north dakota and called my duty station and told them that i still felt like i was being tracked and hunted and that i felt like i had been drugged. i was told that because i was 2 days late for duty to turn around and go back to nc and start the process over again. 

us congressman patrick mchenry attempted to get me re-instated to my same position but some smart ass from customs in dc sent back a letter indicating that my travel difficulties were not serious enough to give me re-instatement.

i had to call someone in nc and borrow money to rent a car to get back to nc. i had spent everything i had to make it to montana. i rented a car from minot, north dakota-the first rental car place as you walk in the door to the left. they would not give me a car-even though they had a parking lot filled with cars. they insisted that i drive a white van with virginia tags on it back to nc. i found this strange. before i left north dakota i called don terry at my duty station in piegan montana and told him the tag number on the van. i felt like the damn thing was going to blow up and it had been sprayed down with something. 

i am leaving out details because i am being rushed to get off the computer. i am at a cookout at my boyfriends sisters house. 

since sept-2006 i have been attacked by these beings 1 or 2 times a year.

these beings may appear as shadows, lights, orbs, or grey like beings. they have put something in my right ear. these beings touch me..They can basically do what they want to me and my own boyfriend is laying beside of me not knowing a damn thing is going on. i can feel when these beings are around and they have been back since feb-05-2011. these beings can also jump into other humans and their eye color will change. these beings are coming in stages and then leaving. 

i am having to get off the computer..If there is anyone out in this world that is going through what i am please e-mail me at [email removed/cms/tg]

sincerely, amy in nc
content.summary: Same attack since sept-2006

content.detailedDescription: My 7 yr old son, my wife and i were driving down i-575, heading toward towne lake pkwy (exit 8) from holly springs (exit 14). a bad storm was brewing so we were trying to get home before it got bad. as we were approaching exit 11 (sixes rd). my wife says to me "what is that" she pointed to my left (i was driving). i look on the north bound side of i-575, hovering about 75-100 ft above the tree line was, plain as day, a blackish-gray cylinder object and it was moving slowly across. astounded by what i was seeing, i got my sons attention and we all watched this object as we drove past it. i wanted to stop and take a video or something but my wife refused because of the storm. it was not moving fast, it had nothing attached to the bottom of it or the sides. very strange! i have looked on the internet for a long time trying to find someone else that had seen the same object but no luck. really and truthfully i dont know why i didnt stop because i have believed in ufo s since i was a kid. i kinda froze up i guess. my wife did not believe in ufo s before this event. she still claims she does not believe but cant explain the object. please comment. anyone else seen something like this in this area??
content.summary: Cylinder - grayish black object. moving along tree -line aprox. 200 ft above.

content.detailedDescription: Walking dog at approximatly 9:20. looked up to see the stars, and straight overhead say 5 large dimly illuminated lights in the shape of a v heading in a sse direction. estimated to be one object, a few hundred feet in altitude, moving at 50 to 70 mph, guessing size as that of a f-15 or 737. a helicopter was flying about half a mile away and thats the only sound i could hear. i could not see an outline of the object, just the lights. like i said , it was very dimly lit, so the sighting was only about 15 sec. long. i'm just curious to know if i was the only one to see it.                                                                          i was standing in front of my house. i always look at the night sky to see the stars and air traffic. i live about 25 miles from lax and about 10 miles from lgb, so there's usually something in the sky. this object was nothing close to anything i've ever seen. i knew this was a similar looking object to sightings from ufo programs on tv. it moved smoothly and silently. i lost sight of it due to it's quickly dimness. i was a bit stunned, but i knew i saw, what i saw.
content.summary: Looked up and saw 5 large lights in the shape of a v or arrow

content.detailedDescription:
See caption at [link moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]

where: home, in, front dock.  exact date is unknown at the moment but could get a better fix on it by digging out the original slides, upon request.  

what: out stargazing, noticed a moving light in northern sky. 

what:  always think of ufos first, then r & d what it actually is.  but no r & d was done on this sighting.  

describe:  see caption with pic above. 

feelings: during, awe, excitement, wonder, hope; during, lift camera carefully to get as clear a pics as possible.  incoming pic was lost, of course.  after, no recall of it at all until the 35mm film was developed x? weeks later.  sometimes half taken rolls of film would be in the camera for ? weeks.  we have no way, except to test via kineseology with an experienced tested, to walk it back through and see.   it was after we moved to in permanently in 1987 and could be 88, 89, 90?  don't know without checking and i don't  have time now.  rsvp if you need it. 

how we lost sight, we don't exactly recall since we didn't recall or have any pics of outgoing, but most likely it went behind the thick forest canopy.   tree top level, or so it seemed at the time, probably 500 or less or so it seemed, now remembered.  see pic to determine for yourselves.  our memories are not so good anymore!  last direction observed was overhead, at the time of the 2nd shot pictured in ufoohdk2.Jpg.  as noted the first 35mm slide in the series of 2 was mysteriously lost.  as such, i checked s below as it's apparent direction but we did not see it go there and wouldn't have because of trees anyway.  shape is clearly torus donut in 3d with our photo from underneath.  strut-like beams can clearly be seen in the original slide, or could when it was fresh, time could have faded it some, we have not seen it for years.  the color was as shown, first white light, rather candle glow, then rainbow-ish all around as pictured.  {i'm inserting notes as memory is jogged by questions below.] 

see also: [link moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg] 

also a part of the stories of tarajories collection in wait of production assistance, with dan aykroyd, of course, suggested as host/narrator.  www.Tarajories.Com/stories.Html for all unbelievably true and amazing stories of non-ordinary reality, mystery and intrigue.  please pass this info to dan if possible.  thanks!  

ps: on continuing this report/survey, re: categories, we are not sure, but we did have 2-3 hypnosis sessions with budd hopkins, during that era, date available with checking if requested, and we do have the transcripts.  since we have never done any r & d on this photo/sighting since, we do not know if this 'just over the treetops' low flying light or craft resulted in ce4, abduction, or not.  significant transformations have resulted over the years but we do not know if it is related.  ak, applied kineseology, via an sensitive, experienced facilitator and/or other feedback devices will tell the tale.  until then, it all remains... a mystery.  

we have had other sightings here with a group of buddhists which was a very memorable event, recalled by all to date, and others as well.  the 'invisible' fly-bys happen, not regularly, but from time to time throughout our 35 year tenure here on the hill, tarajories, sacred site and grid node. 


many blessings and thanks for the great work!

suz
content.summary: Www.Tarajories.Com/ufoohdk2.Html

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i were watching the movie patton on netflix and noticed a strange object that appeared in the sky during one of the scenes. the red dot is not the object we saw but is the reflection of our recording device that appears on our computer's screen.
the object appears at approximately the 28:45 mark of the movie located in the sky of the upper right hand portion of the screen. attached is a crude video we made of the movie as shown from our laptop computer.
content.summary: Strange object that appeared in the movie "patton"
